Sentencas: Use of strontium titanate (SrTiO3) as an anode in solid oxide fuel cells has attracted considerable research attention because of its excellent thermal stability.
Titulo: Preparation of Mesoporous SrTiO3 Particles by Spray Pyrolysis Method

Sentencas: Mesoporous SrTiO3 increases the specific surface area for fuel cell reaction, which in turn increases the fuel-to-electricity conversion efficiency.
Titulo: Preparation of Mesoporous SrTiO3 Particles by Spray Pyrolysis Method

Sentencas: Spray pyrolysis (SP) is advantageous because it entails short processing times and continuous production.
Titulo: Preparation of Mesoporous SrTiO3 Particles by Spray Pyrolysis Method

Sentencas: In this study, we prepared mesoporous SrTiO3 particles through SP.
Titulo: Preparation of Mesoporous SrTiO3 Particles by Spray Pyrolysis Method

Sentencas: Because surfactants, as pore forming agents, may aggregate and reduce the specific surface area of particles, the stable surfactant concentration range was investigated.
Titulo: Preparation of Mesoporous SrTiO3 Particles by Spray Pyrolysis Method

Sentencas: In addition, the short calcination time of SP may cause incomplete decomposition and thus generate an unreacted phase; therefore, various calcination temperatures and an additional wash treatment were explored.
Titulo: Preparation of Mesoporous SrTiO3 Particles by Spray Pyrolysis Method

Sentencas: Finally, SrTiO3 powder with the high specific surface area of 103 m(2)/g was obtained.
Titulo: Preparation of Mesoporous SrTiO3 Particles by Spray Pyrolysis Method
